text:
Stellar PR has engaged Sarah Chen to provide services for the Fresh retail Series on behalf of Show Time. With the rise of retail innovation in Australia, Australians are seeking better retail solutions. As the initiative's campaign lead, Sarah Chen will deliver key messages on media and social channels. This campaign reinforces the brand's position in retail.

INFLUENCER AGREEMENT

This agreement is between Show Time and the Influencer for Show Time Lifestyle Campaign 2025.

COMMERCIAL TERMS:
- Total Fee: $52,758 AUD (inclusive of GST)
- Payment Terms: Net 30 days from invoice date
- Invoice Requirements: Tax invoice required upon completion

DELIVERABLES:
- 2 x Instagram posts

TERMS AND CONDITIONS:
- Engagement Period: 3 months
- Exclusivity Period: 6 weeks
- Territory: Australia
- Usage Rights: 18 months from campaign launch
- Content Rights: Show Time retains full commercial rights

COMPLIANCE:
- All content must comply with ACMA guidelines and ASA codes
- Content is subject to client approval before publication
- Disclosure requirements must be met per ACCC guidelines

LEGAL:
This agreement is governed by Australian law and subject to the jurisdiction of Australian courts.

Agreed terms are subject to final contract execution.
labels: profile_AMAZON _ PBDD Talent Agreement - Jackie Gillies DRAFT  (1)
